send_to_cs: Send to CS if a subscriber mentions a medical issue or an adverse effect from using products from this brand
dos_and_donts: Do not share any medical advice or guidance to subscribers outside of recommending appropriate products or directing them to purchase the right item
Do not comment on their medical situations
Close the covo if the customer says they're receiving too many messages/we're texting them too often - don't send TMT
drive_to_purchase: If cx says they will be ordering soon, offer to schedule a call if they need further assistance with their purchase (shortcut OS) - do not upsell
tone: Don't use the term "hang tight", just say that you've passed the information to the team
Close the conversation once the client takes over
templates: If cx already purchased, use specific TFP template
promo_and_exclusions: We do not offer any discounts for the SPECTRUM

send_to_cs: Send to CS for post purchase issues, use PPI shortcut
Send to CS for Gift Card Errors, use GCI shortcut
tone: DON'T reply to any cx messages about:
â†’ And anything else related to the on court performance of their team that's NEGATIVE
Don't reply to insults regarding the uniforms
templates: For inquiries related to Adrian Griffin or anything coaching-related, use CQS shortcut
When cx shares feedback for what we should sell in the Bucks Pro Shop (Journey response), use JRC shortcut
For membership - specific inquiries, use MMQ shortcut
Before sending the SHP temp, check the delivery time on the product page as some items have longer delivery time-frames
If cx text the code to themselves, use CTC shortcut
If a cx asks for player-specific inquiries, use PCQ shortcut
dos_and_donts: DON'T comment on any ticketing platforms that aren't Ticketmaster or Fevo
For sweepstakes, inform cxs to reply with FYF keyword to enter to win
Refer to this roster page for current players: https://www.nba.com/bucks/roster
drive_to_purchase: Send links from https://shop.bucks.com/ for merchandise
Don't recommend bestsellers if the convo topic isn't about merchandise (e.g. cx share positive feedback about the team), instead use NW shortcut
When recommending bestsellers, send a link to all collections not specific items
promo_and_exclusions: The City Edition collection has been released, any new City Edition products (including Damian Lillard's) will be shared with SMS subscribers first
